attributes.action: Remove the new split Lunch system started at Kings Norton Boys' School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new system, put pressure on teachers to work a 6 period day with limited break. Lunch Time Revise,or/and Sporting activities have been completly removed for the simple fact of calming the school down. Having lunch while classes are still going on is complete madness....

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
